apiDescription: An iterator over a mutable reference to the Some variant of an Option.
The iterator yields one value if the Option is a Some, otherwise none.
This struct is created by the Option::iter_mut function.

trait implementations.name: impl<'a, A> std::iter::Iterator for std::option::IterMut<'a, A>
impl<'a, A> std::iter::DoubleEndedIterator for std::option::IterMut<'a, A>
impl<'a, A> std::iter::TrustedLen for std::option::IterMut<'a, A>
impl<'a, A> std::fmt::Debug for std::option::IterMut<'a, A> where A: 'a + std::fmt::Debug
impl<'a, A> std::iter::ExactSizeIterator for std::option::IterMut<'a, A>
impl<'a, A> std::iter::FusedIterator for std::option::IterMut<'a, A>
impl<'a, A> std::marker::Send for std::option::IterMut<'a, A> where A: std::marker::Send
impl<'a, A> std::marker::Sync for std::option::IterMut<'a, A> where A: std::marker::Sync
